text: Aur yahun per hum ney tamam nakhun walay janwar haram ker diye thay aur gaye aur bakri mein say inn dono ki charbiyan unn per hum ney haram ker di thin magar woh jo unn ki pusht per ya antriyon mein lagi ho ya jo haddi say milli ho. Unn ki shararat kay sabab hum ney unn ko yeh saza di aur hum yaqeenan sachay hain
